comment.author: 44573711@N00
comment._content: This is custom built Stoddard-Dayton camping car built for T.Coleman DuPont (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T._Coleman_du_Pont) for his use in constructing the DuPont Highway through the state of Delaware. A full description of car is included in this NYT article published August 27, 1911. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9B01E3DE163CE6...
